jobDesc: Enhanced payment automation (backend), streamlined partner onboarding, and optimized invoice generation, significantly improving system efficiency by 25%.

Utilized AWS Lambda, AWS, GraphQL, Amazon DynamoDB, REST APIs, Linux, Java, Spring-boot and email template creation tools. Developed HTML/CSS-based email templates, integrated Amazon SES and Amazon Cloud functions
Key contributor to SecretSwap project, a decentralized exchange (DEX), leveraging ReactJS for intuitive UI development.
Integrated and managed smart contracts for token transactions in DeFi. Assisted backend development using NodeJs and MongoDB for secure cryptocurrency transactions
Teaching core full stack technologies React JS, JavaScript, SQL, Node js, Jira, MongoDB database to foster development skills.

project.title: HooBank
project.description: Hoobank application enables it's user to send and receive money electronically. It also allows for quick and easy money transfer to other individuals or businesses in different locations

project.title: Threads App Backend
project.description: A scalable GraphQL backend clone of Facebook's Threads app, emphasizing user authentication, thread creation, media management, and interactions, with a focus on scalability and developer experience.
